editorialNotes.short: Learn to read and pronounce words with your new friend!
editorialNotes.tagline: Learn to read with a friend

editorialNotes.standard: Nothing beats a kid-friendly game that keeps the whole family captivated—and Toca has us snipping, straightening, and styling to our heart's content. Once we've perfected our customer's silly new ‘dos, we make sure to add some accessories, snap a pic, and share the hair.

ios.subtitle: Be a vet and heal the animals

name: Kids Vehicles: City Trucks & Buses HD for the iPad
Star Walk 2 Pro: Night Sky Map

editorialNotes.short: Powerful astronomy toolkit to screen the night sky.
Help Mammoth solve puzzles and learn about fractions.

editorialNotes.standard: Kids (and kids at heart) can unleash their inner scientists with this captivatingly clever robot-creation kit, which features millions of different combinations for mechanical inventions. Whether you’re assembling a wheeled bot with laser guns for arms or a jolly jumping automaton with pogo-stick legs, taking your new bot on a walk through the woods will highlight the success—or the rough edges—of your design. While The Robot Factory teaches some nifty physics basics, we like to play around just for the pure fun of it.
editorialNotes.short: Design and experiment with all types of robots.
Hop on your bike and learn the alphabet while riding.

name: Toddler Games, Puzzles, Shapes
artistName: Kids Academy Co apps: Preschool & Kindergarten Learning Kids Games, Educational Books, Free Songs

name: Articulation Arcade
artistName: Aptus Speech and Language Therapy Limited

ios.subtitle: Build your city & play in it!

editorialNotes.short: Create a thriving metropolis and explore it.
editorialNotes.tagline: Build the city of your dreams
Build your own gears and engines

ios.subtitle: Make a routine & put on a show

editorialNotes.standard: Bursting with beats and energy, Toca Dance will make the whole family want to get up and groove. This incredibly cute game puts kids in charge of their own musical production—choosing dancers, costumes and techno tracks, and choreographing moves using simple swipes and taps. Once the performance starts, the real fun begins: you can fling items at the stage, set off pyrotechnics and other cool effects and even cheer (or boo) your squad. Seeing the payoff—an awesome video you can share—will encourage players to jump right back in and start working on their next great show.

editorialNotes.short: Compose fun musical beats with amusing animals.

ios.subtitle: Take your friends for a swim

editorialNotes.tagline: Check in and get ready to fly

name: One Fish Two Fish - Dr. Seuss

editorialNotes.standard: Dr. Seuss’ classic tale leaps to life in an interactive version with surprises on every page. When they’re not making wacky creatures twist and twirl, our kids are happily searching for hidden mini-games. And, of course, listening to a story they adore as much as we do.

ios.subtitle: Teach your kids to tell time!
